name: Guide It
description:
This game is a brain training game, that will improve your attention skill.
If you are familiar with the lumosity's game "Train of thought" you will enjoy this one.

This is a game where circles start scrolling up and you need to guide them to the right place.

There are two themes available right now but they will be more in the future.

Colourful theme:
You need to guide the coloured circles to their right place, that has the same colour.

Numbers theme:
You need to guide the circles to the right place so that each square contain a number between 0 and 20, if one circle has a number below 0 or over 20 the game will end.
